title: Customize the Streak Emoji on Snapchat: Android & iPhone

steps.title: Open Snapchat.
steps.content: Open Snapchat. Tap the app icon that looks like a white ghost on a yellow background. This method changes your streak emoji , which appears next to Snaps between you and a friend.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. It's in the top left corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . This gear icon will take you to Settings so you can change the streak emoji. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Customize Emojis.
steps.content: Tap Customize Emojis . You'll see this under the "Who can" header. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Snapstreak!.
steps.content: Tap Snapstreak! . It's near the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Select any emoji.
steps.content: Select any emoji. Since the fire emoji is the default emoji, it is also first on the list. You can select any of the emojis on the list. [3] X Research source When you tap to select one, it will appear next to all your Snapstreaks. Changing the emoji will not break the streaks that you have active. It will only change the emoji next to them. You can't change the 100 emoji or the hourglass emoji. The 100 emoji only appears on the 100th day of a streak and will disappear again after that. The hourglass emoji warns you that your streak is in danger of ending.
